body:
Anyone have them where they live?
Redboxes are a box that you can use to rent Movies, Blu-Ray Movies, and Video games.
Movies cost $1.00, Blue-Ray Movies cost $1.50, and Video Games cost $2.00 per day.
I mostly have been renting video games lately.
I rented inFAMOUS 2 on Saturday, was a good play :).
I rented Thief yesterday and I get to keep it for one more day:D
If you are lucky enough you can find a Redbox that has Watch Dogs or GTA 5 :)

title: Redboxes

replies.body: I got a redbox right down the street (actually, 3; there are 3 7-elevens within less than a block of each other ._.)
